entityNameModal.title: Update Your Entity Name
entityNameModal.description: In accordance with our updated <1>Terms of Use</1>, we need to know the name of the entity that controls your project. If you are a DAO, please mention the name of your DAO. If you don't have an entity, please mention your full name.

featureModal.title: Introducing Scout
featureModal.description: A curated list of the best talent on Superteam Earn that you can invite to participate in your listings to get high quality submissions! Add a new listing, or check out any of your currently live listings to try Scout.

welcomeSponsorTemplate.thankYou: Thank you for signing up. Earn is the premier talent-matching platform in crypto, favoured by hundreds of leading companies and thousands of verified crypto-focused talent.
welcomeSponsorTemplate.helpMessage: If you need any help related to setting up your listing on Earn, don't hesitate to get in touch with

welcomeTalentTemplate.greeting: OK let's get this out of the way.
welcomeTalentTemplate.automatedEmail: Even though this is an automated email...
welcomeTalentTemplate.realPerson: I just wanted to say hey and let you know that I'm a real person.
welcomeTalentTemplate.introduction: I'm Kash, and I'm a Core Contributor over at <1>Superteam</1>. I might not know you personally yet, but I'm pumped that you're here.
welcomeTalentTemplate.respectInbox: You have my word that we'll be respectful of your inbox and only email you when we have some fresh new opportunities or a big announcement that we want to tell you about.
welcomeTalentTemplate.replyRequest: reply to this email and let me know why you joined Superteam Earn?
welcomeTalentTemplate.learnMore: Would love to learn more about you.

grantApplicationModal.title: Grant Application
grantApplicationModal.description: If you're working on a project that will help the sponsor's ecosystem grow, apply with your proposal here and we'll respond soon!
grantApplicationModal.projectTitleHelper: What should we call your project?
grantApplicationModal.oneLinerDescriptionHelper: Describe your idea in one sentence.
grantApplicationModal.oneLinerDescriptionPlaceholder: Sum up your project in one sentence
grantApplicationModal.grantAmountHelper: How much funding do you require to complete this project?
grantApplicationModal.walletAddressHelper: Where should we send the funds? No .sol domains please!
grantApplicationModal.projectDetailsHelper: What is the problem you're trying to solve, and how you're going to solve it?
grantApplicationModal.projectDetailsPlaceholder: Explain the problem you're solving and your solution
grantApplicationModal.deadlineHelper: What is the expected completion date for the project?
grantApplicationModal.proofOfWorkHelper: Include links to your best work that will make the community trust you to execute on this project.
grantApplicationModal.proofOfWorkPlaceholder: Provide links to your portfolio or previous work
grantApplicationModal.goalsAndMilestonesHelper: List down the things you hope to achieve by the end of project duration.
grantApplicationModal.goalsAndMilestonesPlaceholder: Outline your project goals and milestones

grantApplicationModal.kpiPlaceholder: What's the key metric for success?

Banner.desktopImageAlt: Illustration — Two people working on laptops outdoors at night, surrounded by a mystical mountainous landscape illuminated by the moonlight
Banner.mobileImageAlt: Illustration — Two people working on laptops outdoors at night, surrounded by a mystical mountainous landscape illuminated by the moonlight
Banner.title:
Find Your Next High
Paying Crypto Gig
Banner.description: Participate in bounties or apply to freelance gigs of world-class crypto companies, all with a single profile.

content.heading: Find your next Content gig
content.description: If you can write insightful essays, make stunning videos, or create killer memes, the opportunities below are calling your name.

development.heading: Find your next Development gig
development.description: If building robust applications and scalable solutions is your forte, don't miss out on the earning opportunities listed below.

design.heading: Find your next Design gig
design.description: If delighting users with eye-catching designs is your jam, you should check out the earning opportunities below.

other.heading: Find your next gig on Earn
other.description: If you have a unique skill set that doesn't fit into the other categories, you might find your next gig here.

filterRow.skillFilterTooltip: The skill filters showcase users based on the skills requested in the listings they've successfully won, not the skills listed in their talent profiles.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon...

listingSuccessModal.shareVerified: Share the love on your socials and invite Earn's best talent!
listingSuccessModal.shareUnverified: Share the love on your socials!

previewListingModal.previewLinkTooltip: This link is for preview purposes only and is accessible only to those who have it. It is not your final link for sharing with your community

underVerificationModal.verificationNeeded: We need to verify your listing before it gets published
underVerificationModal.verificationReason: It's important for us to verify work opportunities added by new sponsors to maintain trust, and keep the platform free of any bad actors. We will try our best to verify your listing within 24 hours.
underVerificationModal.verificationProcess: Once verified, your listing will be published automatically. If we need any information, we will get in touch with you.

DescriptionBuilder.eligibilityRequirementsTooltip: Add here if you have any specific eligibility requirements for the Listing.
DescriptionBuilder.listingDetailsTooltip: Write details about the Listing - About, Requirements, Evaluation Criteria, Resources, Rewards, etc.
DescriptionBuilder.chatGPTLink: Go live in <1 min by using our drafting bot (ChatGPT 4 Required)
DescriptionBuilder.deliverableReferencesDescription: Add links of other projects/websites as references for the kind of deliverables you are looking for.

DescriptionBuilder.editorPlaceholder: Give more details about the Listing...
DescriptionBuilder.dragAndDropFiles: Drag and drop your files here

ListingBasic.titleTooltip: Use a short title to describe the Listing
ListingBasic.slugTooltip: Use a short slug to describe the Listing
ListingBasic.slugHelperText: This field can't be edited after a listing has been published
ListingBasic.geographyTooltip: Select the Superteam region this listing will be available and relevant to. Only users from the region you specify will be able to apply/submit to this listing.
ListingBasic.pocTooltip: Please add a social link of the person people reach out to in case they have questions about this listing.
ListingBasic.deadlineTooltip: Select the deadline date for accepting submissions
ListingBasic.referredByTooltip: Who referred you to add this listing on Superteam Earn?
ListingBasic.foundationPaying: Will the Solana Foundation pay for this listing?
ListingBasic.foundationPayingTooltip: If this toggle is set to "True", Earn will automatically send the Foundation-KYC form to the winners of this listing. The Foundation will directly pay the winners.
ListingBasic.privateListingTooltip: Private listings are only accessible through direct links and do not appear on the Superteam Earn homepage or other public pages on the website.

listingPayments.compensationTypeTooltip: Would you like to keep a fixed compensation for this project, or let applicants send in their quotes?
listingPayments.maxBonusPrizesWarning: Maximum number of bonus prizes allowed is 50
listingPayments.bonusPerPrizeLowWarning: Bonus per prize can't be less than 0.01
listingPayments.errorFixedRewardAmount: Please specify the total reward amount to proceed
listingPayments.errorRangeRewardAmount: Please specify your preferred minimum and maximum compensation range
listingPayments.errorInvalidRange: The compensation range is incorrect; the maximum must be higher than the minimum. Please adjust it
listingPayments.errorEqualRange: The compensation range is incorrect; the maximum must be higher than the minimum. Please adjust it.
listingPayments.errorIncompleteRewards: Please fill all podium ranks or remove unused
listingPayments.fixedCompensationHelper: Interested applicants will apply if the pay fits their expectations
listingPayments.rangeCompensationHelper: Allow applicants to send quotes within a specific range
listingPayments.variableCompensationHelper: Allow applicants to send quotes of any amount
listingPayments.privateListingDescription: This listing will only be accessible via the link — and will not show up anywhere else on the site — since it has been marked as a "Private Listing"
listingPayments.publicListingDescription: Publishing this listing means it will show up on the homepage for all visitors. Make sure the details in your listing are correct before you publish.
listingPayments.lowValueListingWarning: Note: This listing will not show up on Earn's Landing Page since it is ≤$100 in value. Increase the total compensation for better discoverability.

questionBuilder.noteDescription: Names, Emails, Discord / Twitter IDs, SOL wallet and Profile Links are collected by default. Please use this space to ask about anything else!

ListingHeader.projectTooltip: A Project is a short-term gig where sponsors solicit applications from multiple people, and select the best one to work on the Project.
ListingHeader.bountyTooltip: Bounties are open for anyone to participate in and submit their work (as long as they meet the eligibility requirements mentioned below). The best submissions win!

RightSideBar.dontStartWorkingYet: Don't start working just yet! Apply first, and then begin working only once you've been hired for the project.

SubscribeListing.completeProfileModalText: Please complete your profile before subscribing to a listing.

publishResults.resultsAnnouncedPublicly: The results have been announced publicly. Everyone can view the results on the Bounty's page.
publishResults.publishingResultsDescription: Publishing the results of this listing will make the results public for everyone to see! YOU CAN'T GO BACK ONCE YOU PUBLISH THE RESULTS!
publishResults.remainingWinnersToSelect: You still have to select {{count}} more winner(s) before you can publish the results publicly.
publishResults.remainingPaymentsToMake: Don't forget to pay your winners after publishing results. You have to pay to {{count}} winner(s).
publishResults.publishBeforeDeadlineWarning: If you publish the results before the deadline, the listing will close since the winner(s) will have been announced.

SubmissionActionButton.completeProfileModalText: Please complete your profile before submitting to a listing.
SubmissionActionButton.hackathonOpenDate: This track will open for submissions on {{date}}

SubmissionModal.dontStartWorkingYet: Don't start working just yet! Apply first, and then begin working only once you've been hired for the project.
SubmissionModal.sponsorMayContact: Please note that the sponsor might contact you to assess fit before picking the winner.
SubmissionModal.cantWaitToSee: We can't wait to see what you've created!
SubmissionModal.submissionLinkNote: 1. In the "Link to your Submission" field, submit your hackathon project's most useful link (could be a loom video, GitHub link, website, etc)
SubmissionModal.separateSubmissionsNote: 2. To be eligible for different challenges, you need to submit to each challenge separately
SubmissionModal.noRestrictionNote: 3. There's no restriction on the number of challenges you can submit to
SubmissionModal.makeSureLinkAccessible: Make sure this link is accessible by everyone!
SubmissionModal.tweetLinkHelperText: This helps sponsors discover (and maybe repost) your work on Twitter! If this submission is for a Twitter thread bounty, you can ignore this field.
SubmissionModal.compensationRequired: What's the compensation you require to complete this fully?
SubmissionModal.otherInfoHelperText: If you have any other links or information you'd like to share with us, please add them here!
SubmissionModal.addSolanaWalletHelperText: Add your Solana wallet address here. This is where you will receive your rewards if you win. Download
SubmissionModal.ifYouDontHaveWallet: if you don't have a Solana wallet
SubmissionModal.confirmationText: I confirm that I have reviewed the scope of this track and that my submission adheres to the specified requirements. Submitting a project that does not meet the submission requirements, including potential spam, may result in restrictions on future submissions.
SubmissionModal.errorMessage: Sorry! An error occurred while submitting. Please try again or contact us at support@superteamearn.com
SubmissionModal.termsAgreement: By submitting/applying to this listing, you agree to our
SubmissionModal.acknowledgement: You acknowledge that you are submitting your work or application to {{entityName ? `{entityName} ("{sponsorName}")` : sponsorName}}.
SubmissionModal.superteamEarnRole: Superteam Earn acts solely as a platform for the Partner to list contests, bounties, projects or similar engagements ("Activities") on its platform ("ST Earn Platform").
SubmissionModal.superteamEarnLiability: Superteam Earn shall not be liable for any Activities listed by the Partner on the ST Earn Platform. The Partner is solely responsible for the content, rules, scope and execution of their Activities.
SubmissionModal.userParticipationRisk: Users participating in Activities listed by Partners do so at their own risk and discretion. Superteam Earn disclaims all liabilities related to user participation in such Activities.
SubmissionModal.disputeResolution: Any disputes or issues arising between users and partners regarding Activities shall be resolved directly between the parties involved. Superteam Earn shall not be responsible for mediating or resolving such disputes.
SubmissionModal.releaseOfLiability: By using the platform and participating in any Activities, users agree to release Superteam Earn from any claims, liabilities, or damages arising from their participation in Activities listed by Partners.
SubmissionModal.noGuarantee: Superteam Earn does not guarantee the accuracy or legality of Activities listed by Partners. Users are advised to exercise caution and conduct their own due diligence before participating in any Activities.
SubmissionModal.partnerIndemnification: Partners listing Activities on the Platform agree to indemnify and hold Superteam Earn harmless from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from their Activities.
SubmissionModal.additionalTerms: These terms are in addition to our

submissionList.submissionsNotPublic: Submissions are not public until the submission deadline has closed.

CompleteProfileModal.sponsorBodyText: You already have a sponsor profile, but we need other details from you before proceeding with this action. Doing this will not impact your sponsor profile.

ListingTabs.updateEmailPreferences: Update your email preferences (from the user menu) to be notified about new work opportunities.
